meanings.definition: The state or quality of being resplendent.
meanings.sent1: The resplendency of the sunset filled the sky with beauty.
meanings.sent2: Her dress shimmered with resplendency under the lights.
meanings.sent3: The resplendency of the cake made everyone's mouths water.
meanings.sent4: The resplendency of the stars in the night sky was breathtaking.
meanings.sent5: The resplendency of the rainbow after the storm was a sight to behold.

meanings.sent1: The resplendency of the crown dazzled all who beheld it.
meanings.sent2: The resplendency of the fireworks lit up the night sky.
meanings.sent3: The resplendency of the peacock's feathers caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent4: The resplendency of the diamond ring symbolized their eternal love.
meanings.sent5: The resplendency of the golden statue was truly remarkable.
